transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello, Namaskar Himanshu ji Rahul baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Kaise hai sir aap? Badhiya hai sir?
Customer: Ha sir,
Executive: Aapka na email like storage na full ho gaya to usko na thoda sa woh khali kar lijiye. Kuch clients ke mail ya kuch honge woh aapko receive nahi ho payenge iske regarding.
Customer: Hain?
Executive: Jo aapka mail box hai na sir woh full ho gaya hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ha toh usko na sir khali kar lijiye koi, ha koi bhi mail ya aapko receive nahi ho payenge iske regarding. Mail ye dikkat hai sir.
Customer: Mere ko toh [inaudible].
Executive: Kuch regarding guide kar du sir?
Customer: Mere ko zyada nahi hai abhi woh aayega bhaiya toh thodi der mein woh ek ghante bhar baad mein toh woh hi karenge. Main toh isme kuch jaanta bhi nahi hu mobile mein.
Executive: Achha. Woh woh Himanshu ji nahi hai? Himanshu ji abhi aayenge. Himanshu ji aayenge jab woh woh kar denge.
Customer: Ah aap unke brother bol rahe hai sir?
Customer: Haan haan main Dinesh Singh bol raha hu.
Executive: Okay okay sir no problem aur ji sir bataiye.
Customer: Sir badhiya hai ab koi kaam waam toh ho nahi raha sir isme toh kya kare batao aapke IndiaMART mein kuch bhi ek rupaye ka kaam nahi hua saal bhar hone ko aa gaya. Kuch bhi nahi hua.
Executive: Sir aapko inquiry.
Customer: Ek hi cheez sir aapne band kar diye sir kya karenge check karke koi jo hamare jo hamare product ka koi aati nahi hai inquiry. Aati hai sab woh aati fraud fraud aati hai jo bhi aati hai isliye humne toh band hi kar diya dekhna hi band kar diya dekhta hi nahi hu hum toh dekhna hi band kar diya bilkul. Kya karenge dekhna [inaudible].
Executive: [inaudible] fraud nahi hai sir kuch main sach sach.
Customer: Sach batao na sir aap by list bhi apne properly consist [unintelligible]. Isme time kharab karenge apne dusre bhi dusre mein business mein apna time denge na. Ek baat batao jisme dene se koi fayda toh hai nahi hai. Kuch milne wala hai mile jab toh kuch kare bhi. Hai na toh kal ke [unintelligible] leke gaya woh nikatwa hai.
Executive: Achha.
Customer: Aur nahi sir agar main check kar raha hu na apni apni by list properly [unintelligible].
Customer: [inaudible] update karte karte toh itne din ho gaye sir itne din ho gaye check karte karte toh [inaudible].
Executive: 10 to de main aapko time to time follow ups bhi diye hai sir.
Customer: Ek cheez bataiye sir yeh 5 August Narendra Prajapat aap bata rahe ho hum kar rahe hai aap bhi kar rahe ho sab kar rahe hai. Lekin ek bhi ka matlab order kaam ka nahi hai. Mere paas itna maal hai aaj ki dukan meri dukan mein aaj bhi agar aap stock dekhoge toh kam se kam 40 se 50 lakh ke beech ka maal maal ka stock hai mere paas hai. Usme se koi order nahi aata.
Executive: Ji sir woh toh offline toh offline toh aapko badha business hoga. [inaudible].
Customer: Are catalog sahi nahi banaya aapne aaj tak.
Executive: Sir aapko catalog ka kuch 70% score hai sir.
Customer: Catalog jo bhi naye naye aa rahe hai jo bhi aa raha hai jo main abki baar sir main sambhal raha hu. Main sambhal raha hu main sambhal raha hu naye naye aa rahe hai woh sambhal ke baat karke woh reviews de do unko bas khali reviews ke liye woh karte hai. Har karake aur apni khana purti karke dur ho jate hai. Hain? [inaudible].
Executive: Nahi nahi sir ek mujhe bas ek minute dijiye main check.
Customer: Are sir sab aise bolte bolte toh itne din ho gaye hain. Ab hum kya kare batao aap hi bolo. Ya hum toh yeh soch rahe the chalo hum toh bada package lenge hain. Bada package lene ke liye [inaudible].
Executive: Sir aapko catalog ka 70% score hai sir.
Customer: [inaudible].
Executive: Sir aapko catalog ka score pehle kam tha use humne increase kara hai sir 70% score kara hai humne ise.
Customer: Are sir kuch bhi nahi kiya dekho main batau aapko dekho main main bata raha hu main aapko galat nahi bol raha kyuki humko bhi galat bolne mein koi woh nahi aata maza. Ek baat batau ki [inaudible].
Customer: Bhai hum humne dekha toh humko hi pasand nahi hai catalog grahak ko kaha se pasand hoga batao. Hain?
Executive: Sir isme hardly ab sir isme jo aapne photos woh provide ki gayi thi woh already uploaded hai sir ek baar aap check kijiye. Jo photos aapne [inaudible].
Customer: [inaudible] photos uploaded hai dhang se dhang se jaise online mein jaise hoti hai na agar aap toh waisi nahi hai. Ha waisa nahi hai kuch bhi. Jaise tedha medha koi bhi item laga hua hai toh woh laga hua hai chalo ji thik hai kisi ne kuch bhi nahi kiya. Hum aise catalog banayenge hum aise banayenge woh banayenge kuch bhi nahi kiya aaj tak. Ab mere se sahi baat toh yeh hai aap bolte hi raho [inaudible].
Executive: [inaudible] sir aapke end se provide hote hai sir jaisa photos aap mobile se [inaudible].
Customer: Kuch nahi provide kaha se honge are catalog dhang se banayi nahi hai sir toh kaise hoga mere ko samajh mein nahi aa raha. Mere item aapko main main bhejta hu main mere jo aur dusre offline mein chal raha hai woh catalog bhejta hu aapko kaise kaise unme chal raha hai kaam. Ab aapka kya hai aapne kuch kiya hi nahi.
Executive: [inaudible].
Customer: Toh hum kya kar sakte hai batao. [inaudible].
Executive: Iska na humne iska sir aapke na bahut sa product ke descriptions add nahi the groups add nahi the toh humne woh edit kar diye the. But photos jo hota hai na sir main sach batau aapke end se photos aapke end se hota hai.
Customer: [inaudible] ek baat batao aap aap toh khali bewakoof banane ka kaam karte ho bewakoof banaya hum aapke paas aadmi aaya check lene ke liye khali uske baad mein aaj tak koi nahi aaya. Bas check lene ke liye toh bhej diya apne aadmi. [inaudible].
Executive: Nahi nahi sir aisa nahi sir aapko time to time [inaudible].
Customer: Are sir aisa hi hai aisa hi hai. Main main bata raha hu uske baad mein kyu nahi aaya aadmi ek baar bhi?
Executive: Sir woh woh physical [inaudible].
Customer: Main main main condition tay ki thi main condition main condition tay ki thi pehle agar main mere paas aana padega woh bhi bol ke gaya uske baad mein unko phone karta hu toh bolte hai ki hamara toh transfer ho gaya ji woh gaya ji chalo transfer ho gaye kue mein gir jao agar transfer ho gaya toh jinko hain ab kya kare batao batao hum hum kya kare batao. Humko toh hamare jeb se toh paise gaye.
Executive: Ji ji ji sir [inaudible].
Customer: Paise loot ke aur [inaudible].
Executive: [inaudible].
Customer: Ji sir meri baat suniye ek baar main aapko wohi bata raha hu sir humko time to time aapko hum call karte hai sir video meet bhi lete hai agar kuch problem aati hai kuch theek karna hota hai toh.
Customer: [inaudible] aap apne swarth ke liye karte ho apne swarth ke liye karte ho sir kisi ke liye nahi karte ho aap. Paise leke aap free ho gaye.
Executive: Nahi sir main aapki help karne ke liye hamesha call karta hu ki aapko chahiye ho.
Customer: Are are sir main main bhi aisi baat nahi meri meri bhi 50 saal ki umar ho gayi main maine toh sir duniya dekhi hai aisa nahi hai ki main woh hu. Ake hum bhi business karte hai yaar bhai sahab aisa thodi na hai ki hum koi koi road chap aadmi hai jo sahab kuch bhi nahi samajhte toh hum bhi saari cheeze samajhte hai aap bhi naukri kar rahe ho aap bhi naukri kar rahe ho hai na mere ko pata hai hai na lekin ek baat bata du agar meri jagah aap ho toh aap kya karoge bolo. Aap batao.
Executive: Ji sir main samajh gaya main toh woh aapki baat manta hu sir aap keh rahe hai ki hame business nahi mila.
Customer: [inaudible] aapki jeb se paise chal jaye aur business nahi mile nahi aapki jeb se paise chal jaye aur business nahi mile toh aap kya bologe mere ko batao.
Executive: Ek baar baat toh sun lijiye sir aap meri ek baar aap baat toh suniye meri main yeh keh raha hu.
Customer: Ha batao. [inaudible].
Executive: Main keh raha hu ha jaise sir agar maan lijiye agar main koi subscription leta hu kisi platform ka ki mujhe waha pe apna samaan bechna hai thik hai sir.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Sir pehle toh main yeh try karunga ki jo jo mujhe benefit woh provide kar rahe hai main pehle use acche se apne end se kal dream karu. Pehle main apne apne taraf se pura 100% dunga agar result nahi aayega tab main samne wale ko bolunga sir main. Main aapko wohi keh raha hu sir kabhi proper service use hi nahi kari gayi hai sir.
Customer: Are proper use kya karenge jab humne dekhte hai toh item ya toh Jaipur wale jo customer woh dete hai woh aise hai ki jisko ₹10 ki cheez hai usko ₹5 mein chahiye hain humko pata hai humne dekha hai humne dekha hai ₹10 ki ₹10 ki cheez hai ₹5 mein chahiye.
Customer: Toh ₹5 mein hum kaise denge batao aap bhi samajhte ho aap bhi samajhte ho.
Executive: Nahi woh toh main samajh gaya sir jiska jo rate hai woh utne rate pe hi jayega kuch kam zyada toh jayega nahi.
Customer: Bhai ek baat bata do ki woh wholesale rate hai wholesale rate ke mukable mein maal bech rahe hai upar bhi rate de denge humko wholesale rate ki mein bhi bik gaya hai na hamara maal toh koi dikkat nahi hai humko hain lekin ab wholesale rate mein bhi maal lene ke liye tayar nahi hai log toh batao phir kya karenge hum batao.
Executive: Ji ji main bilkul samajh gaya sir.
Customer: Hain?
Executive: Sir aapko jo bhi inquiry like matlab kuch bhi relevant nahi hoti thi sir.
Customer: Ah ab aapka mera woh mera pen hai mere pen aate hai la lakh wale pen banata hu handmade pen bante hai mere handmade kaam hai sara lakh ke pen banata hu lakdi ke pen banata hu usme aate hai pen kaunse wale jo yeh ₹2 ₹3 wale ke unke order aate hai hain. Ab woh bhi woh bolenge 50,000 piece chahiye are 50,000 piece chahiye isme product toh dekho jo mere paas jo hai hain.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Haan bhai main main bhejta hu gai aur woh maang raha hai bhains woh bolega mere ko bhains chahiye toh main bhains kaha se dunga batao. [inaudible].
Executive: Nahi nahi ji samajh gaya woh toh matlab jo cheez aapki hogi aap wohi provide karwa payenge kuch aur toh aap bech hi nahi payenge agar jo hamare paas hai hi nahi.
Customer: Ab ab main bhains kaha se launga main gai rakhta hu toh bhains kaha se la ke dunga batao. Toh agar main aapko sach batau na sir ek baar handmade wale pen banata hu lakdi ke jisme meenakari hote hai handicraft ke item banate hai hum lakh ke pen banate hai lakh wale pen hai ab ab woh aate kaunse wale ₹5000 pen chahiye lekin woh chahiye unko ₹4 mein ₹3 mein mera item ₹10 ₹20 ka item hai mera handmade ka kaam hai toh batao ji kaise de paunga toh aise order aayenge toh kya karunga dekh ke main dekhte dekhte itne din ho gaye sir usme koi response hi nahi hai. Handicraft mein bhi mere woh bhi kai item hai lekin usme koi koi matlab response hi nahi hai sahi toh phir humne toh dekhna hi band kar diya main kaha chalo humne toh yeh socha chalo koi baat nahi yeh humne jua khela tha ₹37,000 hamare aise jua mein gaye woh kya kare.
Executive: Haan haan.
Customer: Ji sir woh toh main bilkul samajh gaya ki matlab jo jitna rate hai utne rate ka hi jayega kam rate ka toh jayega nahi sakta.
Customer: Dhokhadhadi ho gayi woh kya dhokhadhadi hamare saath toh fraud ho gaya hum yeh soch rahe the kisi ne fraud kar diya apne saath woh kya kare batao.
Executive: Sir fraud fraud nahi sir agar main aapko sach batau na sir ek baar normally [inaudible].
Customer: Fraud nahi hai 100% fraud hai kyuki jab aapne bola company ne company ka jo manager tha pehle us samay pe unhone bola ki aapke har 15 din mein ek banda team aayegi hamare kuch bhi jo bhi pareshani hogi solve karegi jis din check leke gaye uske baad mein [inaudible].
Executive: Ji aapko like already pehle matlab inform kara gaya tha ki matlab jo bhi rahega woh aapko 15 din mein visit karega.
Customer: Haan visit karega 15 din mein aise bola tha mere ko.
Executive: Chaliye sir main ise check karwata hu main jo jinne aapko yeh kara tha ek baar unse connect karta hu.
Customer: [inaudible] paise deta hi nahi aise aise paise deta hi nahi agar mere ko nahi bolte toh.
Executive: Bilkul bilkul.
Customer: Aap message karwa lo check karwa lo apna.
Executive: Bilkul sir ek baar na main unse connect main unse connect karta hu main ek baar baat karta hu like kya kya baat hui thi after that sir main aapko pakka revert karta hu.
Customer: Haan haan bilkul dekho aap check karo apna.
Executive: Ji ji bilkul sir aapko same number pe call back karte hai ek baar confirm karke kya baat hui thi sir.
Customer: Thik hai thik hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's email storage is full.

- No business generated through IndiaMART in a year.

- Receives fraudulent inquiries.

- Catalog is not properly created.

- No response to handicraft items.

- No visits after initial check-in.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to guide regarding email storage.

- Executive mentioned catalog has 70% score.

- Executive stated photos are uploaded from customer's end.

- Executive will connect with the concerned team.

- Executive assured a callback after confirmation.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back on the same number.



Alert (If Any):

fraud

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- email, catalog, fraud, inquiries, subscription
